Customer Policy Document for Customer ID: cust_001 Name: Vishal Mehta Email: <EMAIL_MASK> Phone: <PHONE_MASK>0 - Customer has purchased Hot Chocolate multiple times. - Eligible for HOT10 coupon (10% off). - Preferred drinks: Hot Chocolate, Ginger Hot Chocolate.
Internal Notes for Customer ID: cust_002 Name: Rahul Sharma Email: <EMAIL_MASK> Phone: <PHONE_MASK>4 - Prefers Iced Latte. - Often visits evening hours between 6–8 PM.

StarBrew Coffee — Store Information, Policies, Offers, and Customer Experience Guidelines Store Timings: - Opening: 07:00 AM - Closing: 10:00 PM - Weekend Timings: 08:00 AM – 11:00 PM Available Inventory: - Hot Chocolate - Latte - Cappuccino - Mocha - Iced Latte - Hot Cocoa - Winter Specials: Ginger Hot Chocolate, Spicy Latte Active Offers: - HOT10: 10% off Hot Chocolate for repeat customers. - WINTER5: 5% discount on all hot beverages if temperature is below 20°C. - LATTE20: 20% off Latte for loyalty members on Mondays and Fridays. Customer Experience Guidelines: - If the customer mentions being cold, recommend a hot beverage such as Hot Chocolate or Ginger Hot Chocolate. - If customer is near the store, encourage them to come inside and mention the nearest branch distance. - If the customer asks for availability, respond with the updated inventory status. - If a customer is a repeat buyer, suggest something based on their purchase history. - Recommend offers or coupons only when relevant to the customer's preferences. Order & Pickup: - Average order preparation time: 3–5 minutes. - Pickup counter is located at the left side of the entrance. - Mobile orders have priority queueing during peak hours.
